# Edge cases and potential error conditions


   	   
# Comment line that should be filtered
Task with (A) priority in middle
+project without task description
@context without task description
key:value without task description
(invalid) priority format
() empty priority
(AA) invalid priority format
x Completed without date
x invalid-date Completed with invalid date
Task due:not-a-date
Task with key: value:with:colons
Task with spaces:in  key  names
Task  with  excessive    spacing   everywhere   +project   @context   key:value
